title: Never got corruption icon
body: I won a game with two friends, but never got the icon.

replies.body: The [**Corruption Icon**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017) for winning a game of Dark Star: Singularity with 2 friends on your team will be distributed by 5/29/17 11:59 PM PT. If you don't see it by then, then hit us up in a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UwtiK72g,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-05T04:39:41.972+0000)
>
> The [**Corruption Icon**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017) for winning a game of Dark Star: Singularity with 2 friends on your team will be distributed by 5/29/17 11:59 PM PT. If you don't see it by then, then hit us up in a ticket.

Hey @Riot Broporo, for the "2 friends" is it okay if one of them is on your friends list and the other one is a friend of a friend. Will we still get an icon for winning? Thanks!

Ehhhhhhh I'm gonna guess no on that one. I believe in order for the Icon to proc for you, you'd need to actually be playing with two people on **your** friends list. I'd say you could try adding them really quick for those matches!
does it work if both are on your friends list, but you didn't premake the game with them? rare case though :S

they take time to roll them out after you complete the achievement, it's been this way for all events

also Rito put this in the fine print of the 'Learn More' website under the icons and stuff: 
> Icons should appear in your account by 5/29/17 11:59 PM PT.
